  • Uses of IMaterial in camzup.core

    Classes in camzup.core that implement IMaterial
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Material
    Holds data that governs how an entity is displayed by a renderer.
    class 
    MaterialSolid
    A material which holds data to display materials with solid colors only (no textures, or patterns).
    class 
    MaterialUv
    An abstract material which holds data to display textured materials.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MaterialAwt
    A material which supports Images as textures.
    class 
    MaterialPImage
    A material which supports PImages as textures.
